attributes.action: Return the traditional robing and wigs to Judges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Traditional Judges robes have developed over time and are rooted in British legal tradition. They lend dignity and anonymity to the person of the Judge representing the Crown and our laws.
The new style of dress serves no function. It fails to anonymise the Judge and has no foundation in British legal history. They are a ridiculous and pointless garbs which cheapen our legal system.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
